thread.title: 8-Year-Old Dancing Goalie Goes From Entertaining Crowd To Entertaining Millions After Video Goes Viral
thread.title_full: 8-Year-Old Dancing Goalie Goes From Entertaining Crowd To Entertaining Millions After Video Goes Viral

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: 8-Year-Old Dancing Goalie Goes From Entertaining Crowd To Entertaining Millions After Video Goes Viral
text:
8-Year-Old Dancing Goalie Goes From Entertaining Crowd To Entertaining Millions After Video Goes Viral Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
An 8-year-old goalie has gone viral after a video of him dancing in a hockey rink was posted on social media. Noah is from Brampton, Ontario and even though his team hasn’t won a game all season, it didn’t stop him from dancing to Juju On That Beat in full goalie gear. 
According to his mom, Paige Roswell, Noah loves to dance all the time, whether it be on the bench, between whistles or cheering on the second goalie when he’s on the ice. She says the crowds love it and often join in. 
The video has been viewed by millions of people since it was released and when asked what her son thought of all of the attention she said, “He thinks it’s so cool,” Paige told CTVNews.ca. “I’m just kind of in shock.” 
Watch and share this dancing goalie with your friends and family! Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook!
